  • All Classes

Package plugins

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Area
    This tools estimates the area of each category, polygon, or patch in an input image.
    Buffer
    This tool can be used to identify an area of interest within a specified distance of features of interest in a raster data set.
    Centroid
    This tool computes the centroid of raster polygons.
    ClipRasterToPolygon
    This tool can be used to clip one or more rasters to the extent of a vector polygon (shapefile).
    Clump
    This tool re-categorizes data in a raster image by grouping cells that form physically discrete, connected areas into unique categories.
    CompactnessRatio
    The compactness ratio is an indicator of polygon shape complexity.
    CostAccumulation
    This tool can be used to calculate the accumulated cost of traveling from the 'source grid cell' to each other grid cell in a raster dataset.
    CostAllocation
    This tool can be used to identify the 'catchment area' of each source grid cell in a cost-distance analysis.
    CostPathway
    This tool can be used to map the least-cost pathway connecting each destination grid cell in a cost-distance analysis to a source cell.
    EdgeProportion
    This tool will measure the edge proportion i.e., the proportion of grid cells in a polygon that are located along the polygon's boundary, for an input raster image.
    ElongationRatio
    This tool can be used to calculate the elongation ratio for polygons.
    ErasePolygonFromRaster
    This tool can be used to remove (replace with no-data values) one or more areas defined by a vector polygon (shapefile) from a rasters.
    EuclideanAllocation
    This tool assigns grid cells in the output image the value of the nearest target cell in the input image, measured by the Euclidean distance (straight-line distance).
    EuclideanDistance
    This tool will estimate the Euclidean distance (straight-line distance) between each grid cell and the nearest 'target cell' in the input image.
    FindPatchOrClassEdgeCells
    This tool finds all grid cells in a raster image containing categorical data (classes or objects) that are located on the edge of patch or class features.
    FractalDimension
    This tool can be used on raster or vector file to calculate the fractal dimension of a polygon (measure of polygon shape irregularity and overall complexity)
    HoleProportion
    This calculates the proportion of the total area of a polygon's holes (i.e., islands) relative to the area of the polygon's hull.
    IsolateRasterFeaturesByLocation
    This tool can be used to either isolate or remove polygon features from a raster image based on their spatial relationship with the features in a second raster data set.
    LinearityIndex
    This tool calculates the linearity index of polygon features based on a regression analysis.
    MaxAbsOverlay
    This tool can be used to find the maximum absolute (non-negative) value in each cell of a grid from a set of input images.
    MaxOverlay
    This tool can be used to find the maximum value in each cell of a grid from a set of input images.
    MinOverlay
    This tool can be used to find the minimum value in each cell of a grid from a set of input images.
    PatchOrientation
    This tool calculates the orientation of polygon features based on a regression analysis.
    PatchOrientationVectorField
    This tool takes a vector shapefile containing polygons, calculates the linearity (i.e., r-squared value) and orientation, and outputs a shapefile of line vectors.
    Perimeter
    This tool can be used to measure the length of the perimeter of polygon features in a raster or vector layer.
    PerimeterAreaRatio
    The perimeter-area ratio is an indicator of polygon shape complexity.
    RadiusOfGyration
    This can be used to calculate the radius of gyration (RoG) for the polygon features within a raster image.
    Reclass
    This tool creates a new raster in which the value of each grid cell is determined by an input raster and a collection of user-defined classes.
    ReclassEqualInterval
    This tool reclassifies the values in an input raster file based on an equal-interval scheme, where the user must specify the reclass interval value, the starting value, and optionally, the ending value.
    ReclassFromFile
    This tool creates a new raster image in which the value of each grid cell is determined by the values in an input raster image and a reclass file.
    RelatedCircumscribingCircle
    This tool can be used on either raster or vector files to calculate the related circumscribing circle (a circle which passes through all vertex features of a polygon).
    ShapeComplexityIndex
    This tool provides a measure of overall polygon shape complexity, or irregularity, for both raster and vector features.
    WeightedOverlay
    This tool performs a weighted overlay on multiple input images.
    WeightedSum
    This tool performs a weighted summation on multiple input images.
